tags.name: cv-action-ribbon
tags.description: Provide a common, dynamic region for user actions and feedback which applies to a subset of the UI.

attributes.name: labelText
attributes.description: Text to be displayed in the action ribbon

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
State representation which can take the values:
active|negative|positive|caution

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon added to the action ribbon

attributes.name: iconAriaLabel
attributes.description: aria-label of the icon

attributes.name: centered
attributes.description: boolean Centers the action ribbon

tags.name: cv-alert
tags.description: Notification informing users about important information or events.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon added to the alert

attributes.name: state
attributes.description:
State representation which can take the values:
active|negative|positive|caution

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: boolean Displays the alert inline with its container

attributes.name: titleText
attributes.description: Title of the alert

attributes.name: iconAriaLabel
attributes.description: aria-label for the icon

attributes.name: descriptionText
attributes.description: Description of the alert

tags.name: cv-app-shell
tags.description: The structural foundation of an application, including its layout and navigation.

attributes.name: appName
attributes.description: Name of the application to show in the small app bar

attributes.name: sectionName
attributes.description: Name of the section shown above the navigation

attributes.name: helpOpen
attributes.description: boolean Opens the help section

attributes.name: drawerOpen
attributes.description: boolean Opens the drawer

attributes.name: contained
attributes.description: boolean Wraps the main area with a contained card surface

attributes.name: forcedOpen
attributes.description: boolean Force the left navigation visibly open

tags.name: cv-badge
tags.description: A small visual element indicating status or providing additional information.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: The content to be displayed in the badge

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Caps the value of badge content

attributes.name: size
attributes.description:
Sets the size of the badge with the values:
small | large

attributes.name: hideBadge
attributes.description: boolean Controls the visibility of the badge

attributes.name: verticalAlignment
attributes.description: Aligns the badge vertically in the wrapped element with values: top | bottom

attributes.name: horizontalAlignment
attributes.description: Aligns the badge horizontally in the wrapped element with values: left | right

attributes.name: showZero
attributes.description: boolean Shows the badge when content is zero

tags.name: cv-button
tags.description: Common buttons prompt most actions in a UI

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label to display for the button, and aria-label

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon to display, and aria-label value when label is not defined

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Applies the button color

attributes.name: raised
attributes.description: boolean Creates a contained button that is elevated above the surface

attributes.name: unelevated
attributes.description: boolean Creates a contained button that is flush with the surface

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: boolean Creates an outlined button that is flush with the surface

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: boolean Makes the button text and container slightly smaller

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect

attributes.name: expandContent
attributes.description: boolean When true, the space after the label and before any trailing icon, where default slotted content is rendered, is expanded to fit the available space inside the button

attributes.name: fullwidth
attributes.description: boolean When true, the button is expanded to fit the entire available space.

attributes.name: trailingIcon
attributes.description: boolean When true, icon will be displayed after label

tags.name: cv-card
tags.description: Container presenting information or content in a visually distinct format.

attributes.name: cardTitle
attributes.description: The title of the card

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: boolean Style the card as an outline variant

attributes.name: actionBar
attributes.description: boolean Displays the action bar

attributes.name: interactive
attributes.description: boolean Displays the ripple affect in primary area

tags.name: cv-check-list-item
tags.description: An item in a list that users can mark as completed or incomplete.

attributes.name: graphic
attributes.description: Determines which graphic layout to show and enables the graphic slot when value is not control or null.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value associated with this list item.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: Used to group items together

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Trimmed textContent of the list item.

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Reflects tabindex and sets internal tab indices.

attributes.name: left
attributes.description: boolean Displays the checkbox on the left. Overrides graphic.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: boolean Denotes that the list item is selected.

attributes.name: hasMeta
attributes.description: boolean Activates the meta layout tile and enables the meta slot.

attributes.name: twoLine
attributes.description: boolean Activates the two-line variant and enables the secondary slot.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Reflects disabled and sets internal disabled attributes.

attributes.name: activated
attributes.description: boolean Activates focus-persistent ripple.

attributes.name: multipleGraphics
attributes.description: boolean Allows arbitrary width for multiple slotted graphics.

attributes.name: noninteractive
attributes.description: boolean Disables focus and pointer events for the list item.

tags.name: cv-checkbox
tags.description: Interactive element allowing users to select one or more options from a list.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: boolean Whether the checkbox is checked.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: boolean When a checkbox is the parent of a set of child checkboxes, the indeterminate state is used on the parent to indicate that some but not all of its children are checked.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean When true, the checkbox cannot be interacted with, and renders in muted colors.

attributes.name: reducedTouchTarget
attributes.description: boolean When true, the checkbox remove padding for touchscreens and increase density. Note, the checkbox will no longer meet accessibility guidelines for touch.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value that will be included if the checkbox is submitted in a form.

tags.name: cv-chip-set
tags.description: Compact visual element representing an attribute, action, or choice.

attributes.name: selectable
attributes.description: (required) boolean Sets the chips as selectable/actionable

attributes.name: multi
attributes.description: boolean Sets the chips as mulit-selectable

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The arial label for the the chip set

attributes.name: activeIndex
attributes.description: Sets the chip at the provided Index as active

tags.name: cv-chip
tags.description: Individual item within a chip list.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: (required) The text label of the chip

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: The state representation with the values: secondary|negative|positive|caution

attributes.name: filter
attributes.description: boolean Sets the filter chip variant

attributes.name: trailingIcon
attributes.description: boolean Moves the icon to a trailing position

attributes.name: avatar
attributes.description: boolean Treats the leading icon like an avatar

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disables the chip

tags.name: cv-circular-progress
tags.description: Visual indication of progress displayed in a circular format.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: boolean Sets the circular-progress into its indeterminate state.

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: Sets the progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1].

attributes.name: density
attributes.description: Sets the progress indicator's sizing based on density scale. Minimum value is -8. Each unit change in density scale corresponds to 4px change in side dimensions. The stroke width adjusts automatically.

attributes.name: closed
attributes.description: boolean Sets the progress indicator to the closed state. Sets content opacity to 0. Typically should be set to true when loading has finished.

tags.name: cv-code-snippet
tags.description: Portion of code displayed within an interface, often for demonstration or explanation.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label displayed in the header of the code snippet

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: The language used in the code snippet

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: boolean Displays the code snippet as an inline element

attributes.name: hideHeader
attributes.description: boolean Hides the header

attributes.name: maxHeight
attributes.description: Sets the max height of the code snippet in pixels

tags.name: cv-dialog
tags.description: Modal window prompting users for input or displaying critical information.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: (required) boolean Opens the dialog when true

attributes.name: hideActions
attributes.description: boolean Hides the actions footer of the dialog. Needed to remove excess padding when no actions are slotted in.

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: boolean Stacks the action buttons.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Heading text of the dialog

attributes.name: scrimClickAction
attributes.description: Setting this attribute to an empty string "" will prevent clicks outside the dialog from closing the dialog.

attributes.name: escapeKeyAction
attributes.description: Setting this attribute to an empty string "" will prevent the escape key from closing the dialog.

attributes.name: defaultAction
attributes.description: Action to be emitted with the closing and closed events when <cv-dialog>.open is toggled

attributes.name: actionAttribute
attributes.description: Attribute to read in light dom of dialog for closing action value

attributes.name: initialFocusAttribute
attributes.description: Attribute to search for in light dom for initial focus on dialog open.

tags.name: cv-empty-state
tags.description: Placeholder content displayed when there is no data to show.

attributes.name: headline
attributes.description: The headline of the empty state

attributes.name: subtitle
attributes.description: The subtitle displayed below the headline

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The icon displayed in the empty state

attributes.name: card
attributes.description: boolean Styles the empty state like a card

tags.name: cv-expansion-panel
tags.description: Collapsible panel revealing additional content when expanded.

attributes.name: noSurface
attributes.description: boolean Sets the theme surface to transparent

attributes.name: titleWidth
attributes.description: Sets the width of the title

tags.name: cv-expansion-panel-item
tags.description: Individual item within an expansion panel.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The title of the panel item

attributes.name: contentPreview
attributes.description: The content preview text of the panel item

attributes.name: index
attributes.description: Sets the index of the panel item

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: boolean Expands the panel item when true

attributes.name: isTopPanel
attributes.description: boolean True for the top most panel item in an expansion panel

attributes.name: isBottomPanel
attributes.description: boolean True for the bottom most panel item in an expansion panel

attributes.name: isInnerPanel
attributes.description: boolean True for the inner panel items in an expansion panel

attributes.name: isSinglePanel
attributes.description: boolean True if the expansion panel has a single panel item

attributes.name: belowOpenInnerPanel
attributes.description: boolean True for the panel item below an open inner panel in an expansion panel

attributes.name: aboveOpenInnerPanel
attributes.description: boolean True for the panel item above an open inner panel in an expansion panel

attributes.name: separateSinglePanel
attributes.description: boolean If the panel right below the top panel or right above the bottom panel is opened, the very top or bottom panel becomes a single panel.

attributes.name: showFooter
attributes.description: boolean Shows the footer in the panel item

attributes.name: noSurface
attributes.description: boolean Sets the theme surface to transparent

tags.name: cv-formfield
tags.description: Input field within a form for users to enter data.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: (required) The text to display for the label and sets a11y label on input. (visually overriden by slotted label)

attributes.name: alignEnd
attributes.description: boolean Aligns the component at the end of the label.

attributes.name: spaceBetween
attributes.description: boolean Add space between the component and the label as the formfield grows.

attributes.name: nowrap
attributes.description: boolean Prevents the label from wrapping and overflow text is ellipsed.

tags.name: cv-icon
tags.description: Symbol representing an action, object, or concept.

tags.name: cv-icon-button
tags.description: Button with an icon as the primary visual element.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Icon to display, and aria-label value when label is not defined.

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.description: aria-label for the icon button.

attributes.name: aria-haspopup
attributes.description: Indicates the availability and type of an interactive popup element, such as menu or dialog, that can be triggered by the button.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect.

tags.name: cv-icon-button-toggle
tags.description: Toggle button featuring an icon as the visual indicator of its state.

attributes.name: toggledOn
attributes.description: boolean Whether the toggle is activated.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disabled buttons cannot be interacted with and have no visual interaction effect.

attributes.name: onIcon
attributes.description: Icon to display when on is true.

attributes.name: offIcon
attributes.description: Icon to display when on is false.

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the button.

attributes.name: ariaLabelOn
attributes.description: aria-label of the button when on is true. If set, ariaLabelOff must also be set.

attributes.name: ariaLabelOff
attributes.description: aria-label of the button when on is false. If set, ariaLabelOn must also be set.

tags.name: cv-checkbox-icon
tags.description: Checkbox styled with an icon as its visual representation.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: boolean True when the icon checkbox is checked

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disables the icon checkbox and renders in muted colors.

attributes.name: iconOnly
attributes.description: boolean Displays the icon without any text in the icon checkbox

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value that will be included if the checkbox is submitted in a form.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Sets the width of the icon checkbox

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Sets the height of the icon checkbox

tags.name: cv-radio-icon
tags.description: Radio button styled with an icon as its visual representation.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: boolean True when the icon radio is checked

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disables the icon radio and renders in muted colors.

attributes.name: iconOnly
attributes.description: boolean Displays the icon without any text in the icon radio

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the input for form submission. Maps to the native value attribute.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the input for form submission, and identifier for the selection group. Only one radio button can be checked for a given selection group. Maps to the native name attribute.

tags.name: cv-linear-progress
tags.description: Visual indication of progress displayed in a linear format.

attributes.name: buffer
attributes.description: Sets the buffer progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1]. Setting this value to be less than 1 will reveal moving, buffering dots.

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: Sets the primary progress bar's value. Value should be between [0, 1].

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description: boolean Sets the linear-progress into its indeterminate state.

attributes.name: reverse
attributes.description: boolean Reverses the direction of the linear progress indicator.

attributes.name: closed
attributes.description: boolean Sets the progress indicator to the closed state. Sets content opactiy to 0. Typically should be set to true when loading has finished.

tags.name: cv-list
tags.description: Collection of items displayed vertically or horizontally.

attributes.name: activatible
attributes.description: boolean Sets activated attribute on selected items which provides a focus-persistent highlight.

attributes.name: rootTabbable
attributes.description: boolean When true, sets tabindex="0" on the internal list. Otherwise sets tabindex="-1".

attributes.name: multi
attributes.description: boolean When true, enables selection of multiple items. This will result in index being of type Set<number> and selected returning ListItemBase[].

attributes.name: wrapFocus
attributes.description: boolean When true, pressing up on the keyboard when focused on the first item will focus the last item and down when focused on the last item will focus the first item.

attributes.name: noninteractive
attributes.description: boolean When true, disables focus and pointer events (thus ripples) on the list. Used for display-only lists.

attributes.name: itemRoles
attributes.description: Determines what role attribute to set on all list items.

attributes.name: innerAriaLabel
attributes.description: aria-label of the internal <ul> element.

attributes.name: innerRole
attributes.description: Role of the internal <ul> element.

tags.name: cv-list-item
tags.description: Individual item within a list.

attributes.name: graphic
attributes.description: Determines which graphic layout to show and enables the graphic slot.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Trimmed textContent of the list item.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value associated with this list item

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Reflects tabindex and sets internal tab indices.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: Used to group items together

attributes.name: hasMeta
attributes.description: boolean Activates the meta layout tile and enables the meta slot.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Reflects disabled and sets internal disabled attributes.

attributes.name: twoline
attributes.description: boolean Activates the two-line variant and enables the secondary slot.

attributes.name: activated
attributes.description: boolean Activates focus-persistent ripple.

attributes.name: multipleGraphics
attributes.description: boolean Allows arbitrary width for multiple slotted graphics.

attributes.name: noninteractive
attributes.description: boolean Disables focus and pointer events for the list item.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: boolean Denotes that the list item is selected.

tags.name: cv-menu
tags.description: Collection of options or actions presented in an overlay in list format.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: boolean Opens the menu.

attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: Determines from which element the floating menu should calculate sizing and position offsets. In the default case, both mwc-menu and the anchor should share a parent with position:relative. Changing anchor typically requires absolute or fixed. Takes one of: HTMLElement | null

attributes.name: menuCorner
attributes.description: Horizontal corner of the menu from which the menu should position itself. NOTE: Only horizontal corners are supported.

attributes.name: x
attributes.description: Sets horizontal position when absolute. When given an anchor, sets horizontal position relative to anchor at given corner. Requires y not to be null.

attributes.name: y
attributes.description: Sets vertical position when absolute. When given an anchor, sets vertical position relative to anchor at given corner. Requires x not to be null.

attributes.name: defaultFocus
attributes.description: Item to focus upon menu open.

attributes.name: innerAriaLabel
attributes.description: Proxies to cv-list's innerAriaLabel property.

attributes.name: innerRole
attributes.description: Proxies to cv-list's innerRole property

attributes.name: quick
attributes.description: boolean Whether to skip the opening animation.

attributes.name: absolute
attributes.description: boolean Makes the menu's position absolute which will be relative to whichever ancestor has position:relative. Setting x and y will modify the menu's left and top. Setting anchor will attempt to position the menu to the anchor.

attributes.name: fixed
attributes.description: boolean Makes the menu's position fixed which will be relative to the window. Setting x and y will modify the menu's left and top. Setting anchor will attempt to position the menu to the anchor's immediate position before opening.

attributes.name: forceGroupSelection
attributes.description: boolean Forces a menu group to have a selected item by preventing deselection of menu items in menu groups via user interaction.

attributes.name: fullwidth
attributes.description: boolean Sets surface width to 100%.

attributes.name: stayOpenOnBodyClick
attributes.description: boolean Prevents the menu from closing when clicking outside the menu.

attributes.name: wrapFocus
attributes.description: boolean Proxies to cv-list's wrapFocus property.

attributes.name: multi
attributes.description: boolean Proxies to cv-list's multi property.

attributes.name: activatable
attributes.description: boolean Proxies to cv-list's activatable property.

tags.name: cv-nav-list-item
tags.description: Item within a navigation menu or list.

attributes.name: graphic
attributes.description: Determines which graphic layout to show and enables the graphic slot.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Trimmed textContent of the list item.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value associated with this list item

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Reflects tabindex and sets internal tab indices.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: Used to group items together

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: boolean Determines if the navigation list item is open

attributes.name: hasChildren
attributes.description: boolean Determines if the navigation list item has children

attributes.name: hasMeta
attributes.description: boolean Activates the meta layout tile and enables the meta slot.

attributes.name: twoLine
attributes.description: boolean Activates the two-line variant and enables the secondary slot.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Reflects disabled and sets internal disabled attributes.

attributes.name: activated
attributes.description: boolean Activates focus-persistent ripple.

attributes.name: multipleGraphics
attributes.description: boolean Allows arbitrary width for multiple slotted graphics.

attributes.name: noninteractive
attributes.description: boolean Disables focus and pointer events for the list item.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: boolean Denotes that the list item is selected.

attributes.name: subnav
attributes.description: boolean

tags.name: cv-radio
tags.description: A control that allows users to select only one option from a set.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: boolean Specifies whether this radio button is the currently-selected one in its group. Maps to the native checked attribute.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean If true, this radio button cannot be selected or de-selected. Maps to the native disabled attribute.

attributes.name: global
attributes.description: boolean If true, this radio button will use a global, document-level scope for its selection group rather than its local shadow root.

attributes.name: reducedTouchTarget
attributes.description: boolean When true, the radio removes touch target that extends beyond visual boundary of the component. Set to false by default to meet Material accessibility guidelines.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the input for form submission, and identifier for the selection group. Only one radio button can be checked for a given selection group. Maps to the native name attribute.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the input for form submission. Maps to the native value attribute.

tags.name: cv-radio-list-item
tags.description: An item in a list that a user can mark selected or unselected.

attributes.name: graphic
attributes.description: Determines which graphic layout to show and enables the graphic slot when value is not control or null.

attributes.name: group
attributes.description: Used to group the internal radios together.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value associated with this list item.

attributes.name: tabindex
attributes.description: Reflects tabindex and sets internal tab indices.

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Trimmed textContent of the list item.

attributes.name: left
attributes.description: boolean Displays the checkbox on the left. Overrides graphic.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Reflects disabled and sets internal disabled attributes.

attributes.name: twoline
attributes.description: boolean Activates the two-line variant and enables the secondary slot.

attributes.name: activated
attributes.description: boolean Activates focus-persistent ripple.

attributes.name: multipleGraphics
attributes.description: boolean Allows arbitrary width for multiple slotted graphics.

attributes.name: hasMeta
attributes.description: boolean Activates the meta layout tile and enables the meta slot.

attributes.name: noninteractive
attributes.description: boolean Disables focus and pointer events for the list item.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: boolean Denotes that the list item is selected.

tags.name: cv-select
tags.description: Interactive menu allowing users to choose from a list of options.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Sets floating label value. NOTE: The label will not float if the selected item has a falsey value property.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The select control's value determined by the value property of the currently selected list item. Setting value will attempt to select a list-item with the same value. If one does not match, it will set itself to "" and the index to -1. Setting value before the list item is attached will not select the item.

attributes.name: validationMessage
attributes.description: Message to show in the error color when the select is invalid. (Helper text will not be visible)

attributes.name: helper
attributes.description: Helper text to display below the select. Always displays by default.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Leading icon to display in select. See mwc-icon. Note: for proper list spacing, each list item must have graphic="icon" or graphic="avatar" to be set.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: (required) boolean Displays error state if value is empty and select is blurred.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: (required) boolean Whether or not to show the material outlined variant.

attributes.name: naturalMenuWidth
attributes.description: boolean Sets the dropdown menu's width to auto.

attributes.name: fixedMenuPosition
attributes.description: boolean Sets the dropdown menu's position to fixed. This is useful when the select is inside of a stacking context e.g. inside of an mwc-dialog. Note, that --mdc-menu-min-width or --mdc-menu-max-width may have to be set to resize the menu to the width anchor.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Whether or not the select should be disabled.

attributes.name: validateOnInitialRender
attributes.description: boolean Runs validation check on initial render.

tags.name: cv-side-sheet
tags.description: Panel displayed on the side of the screen, often used for navigation or additional content.

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Heading of the side sheet.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: (required) boolean Opens the side sheet

attributes.name: pushed
attributes.description: boolean When true occupies the entire viewport width.

attributes.name: noPadding
attributes.description: boolean Removes the padding in the side sheet

tags.name: cv-slider
tags.description: Input control allowing users to select a value within a range.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Current value of the slider.

attributes.name: valueEnd
attributes.description: Proxy of value.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Value representing the minimum allowed value.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Value representing the minimum allowed value.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Step for value quantization.

attributes.name: withTickMarks
attributes.description: Displays tick marks which represent predetermind values to which the user can move the slider. NOTE: the slider must be discrete to display tick marks, and to function correctly, there must be an integer amount of total steps within the range. i.e. (max - min) % step === 0

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Disables the slider, preventing interaction.

attributes.name: discrete
attributes.description: boolean Displays a numeric value label upon pressing the thumb which allows the user to select an exact value.

tags.name: cv-slider-range
tags.description: Input control allowing users to select a value within a range.

attributes.name: disable
attributes.description: boolean Disables the slider, preventing interaction.

attributes.name: discrete
attributes.description: boolean Displays a numeric value label upon pressing the thumb which allows the user to select an exact value.

attributes.name: withTickMarks
attributes.description: Displays tick marks which represent predetermind values to which the user can move the slider. NOTE: the slider must be discrete to display tick marks, and to function correctly, there must be an integer amount of total steps within the range. i.e. (max - min) % step === 0

attributes.name: valueStart
attributes.description: Current value of the start thumb handle.

attributes.name: valueEnd
attributes.description: Current value of the end thumb handle.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Value representing the minimum allowed value.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Value representing the maximum allowed value.

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Step for value quantization.

tags.name: cv-snackbar
tags.description: Temporary notification displayed at the bottom of the screen.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: (required) boolean Whether the snackbar is currently open.

attributes.name: leading
attributes.description: boolean Enables the leading layout (see above).

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: boolean Enables the stacked layout.

attributes.name: closeOnEscape
attributes.description: boolean Whether the snackbar closes when it is focused and the user presses the ESC key. Defaults to false.

attributes.name: timeoutMs
attributes.description: Automatic dismiss timeout in milliseconds. Value must be between 4000 and 10000 (or -1 to disable the timeout completely) or an error will be thrown. Defaults to 5000 (5 seconds).

attributes.name: labelText
attributes.description: The text content of the label element.

tags.name: cv-status-dialog
tags.description: Modal window displaying messages indicating the status, along with optional details.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Current state of the status dialog

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Header text of the status dialog

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: boolean Whether the status dialog is open

attributes.name: hideActions
attributes.description: boolean Whether the actions section is hidden

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: boolean Stacks the action buttons

attributes.name: scrimClickAction
attributes.description: Setting this attribute to an empty string "" will prevent clicks outside the dialog from closing the dialog.

attributes.name: escapeKeyAction
attributes.description: Setting this attribute to an empty string "" will prevent the escape key from closing the dialog.

attributes.name: defaultAction
attributes.description: Action to be emitted with the closing and closed events when <cv-status-dialog>.open is toggled

attributes.name: actionAttribute
attributes.description: Attribute to read in light dom of dialog for closing action value

attributes.name: initialFocusAttribute
attributes.description: Attribute to search for in light dom for initial focus on dialog open.

tags.name: cv-status-header
tags.description: Header section indicating the status or context of the content.

attributes.name: titleText
attributes.description: Title of the status header.

attributes.name: statusText
attributes.description: Text for the current status.

attributes.name: statusHelper
attributes.description: Helper text for the current status.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Current state of the status header.

tags.name: cv-status-header-item
tags.description: Item within a status header.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label for the status header item.

tags.name: cv-switch
tags.description: Toggle control allowing users to switch between two states.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description: boolean If true, the switch is on. If false, the switch is off.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Indicates whether or not the switch is disabled.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The form name of the switch.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The value of the switch to submit in a form when selected.

tags.name: cv-tab
tags.description: A component that organizes content across different screens, data sets, and other interactions

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: (required) Text label to display in tab.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Material design icon name to display (overridden by slotted icon).

attributes.name: indicatorIcon
attributes.description: Material design icon name to display as the indicator.

attributes.name: hasImageIcon
attributes.description: boolean Displays a slot to show an image icon.

attributes.name: isFadingIndicator
attributes.description: boolean Indicator fades in and out instead of sliding.

attributes.name: minWidth
attributes.description: boolean Shrinks tab as narrow as possible without causing text to wrap.

attributes.name: isMinWidthIndicator
attributes.description: boolean Shrinks indicator to be the size of the content.

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: boolean Stacks icon on top of label text.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: boolean Indicates whether the tab's indicator is active.

tags.name: cv-tab-bar
tags.description: Navigation element allowing users to switch between different sections or views.

attributes.name: activeIndex
attributes.description: Index of tab that is active.

tags.name: cv-typography
tags.description: Styling and formatting of text.

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description: (required) The typography scale to be applied.

tags.name: cv-textarea
tags.description: Input field allowing users to enter multiple lines of text.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Sets number of visible text lines.

attributes.name: cols
attributes.description: Sets the visible width of the textarea.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The input control's value.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: A string specifying the type of control to render.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Sets floating label value.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the name attribute on the internal textarea.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets disappearing input placeholder.

attributes.name: helper
attributes.description: Helper text to display below the input. Display default only when focused.

attributes.name: helperPersistent
attributes.description: boolean Always show the helper text despite focus.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: boolean Whether or not to show the material outlined variant.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: boolean Displays error state if value is empty and input is blurred.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Whether or not the input should be disabled.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Leading icon to display in input. See cv-icon.

attributes.name: iconTrailing
attributes.description: Trailing icon to display in input. See cv-icon.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: Maximum length input to accept.

attributes.name: charCounter
attributes.description: boolean Note: requires maxLength to be set. Display character counter with max length.

attributes.name: validationMessage
attributes.description: Message to show in the error color when the textarea is invalid. (Helper text will not be visible)

attributes.name: validityState
attributes.description: The ValidityState of the textfield. (Read only)

attributes.name: willValidate
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.willValidate (Read only)

attributes.name: validityTransform
attributes.description: Callback called before each validation check.

attributes.name: validateOnInitialRender
attributes.description: boolean Runs validation check on initial render.

tags.name: cv-text-lockup
tags.description: Grouping of text elements with a consistent style or layout.

attributes.name: subText
attributes.description: Sub text for the text lockup.

attributes.name: scale
attributes.description: Sets the size of the lockup.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Leading icon for the subtext.

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Sets the state of the lockup.

attributes.name: trailingSubText
attributes.description: boolean Positions the subtext in trailing position of the lockup.

tags.name: cv-textfield
tags.description: Input field allowing users to enter a single line of text.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The input control's value.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: A string specifying the type of control to render.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Sets floating label value.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Sets the name attribute on the internal textarea.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Sets disappearing input placeholder.

attributes.name: helper
attributes.description: Helper text to display below the input. Display default only when focused.

attributes.name: helperPersistent
attributes.description: boolean Always show the helper text despite focus.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: boolean Whether or not to show the material outlined variant.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: boolean Displays error state if value is empty and input is blurred.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: boolean Whether or not the input should be disabled.

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: boolean

attributes.name: prefix
attributes.description: Prefix text to display before the input.

attributes.name: suffix
attributes.description: Suffix text to display after the input.

attributes.name: pattern
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.pattern (empty string will unset attribute)

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.min (empty string will unset attribute)

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.max (empty string will unset attribute)

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.size (null will unset attribute)

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.step (null will unset attribute)

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Leading icon to display in input. See cv-icon.

attributes.name: iconTrailing
attributes.description: Trailing icon to display in input. See cv-icon.

attributes.name: maxLength
attributes.description: Maximum length input to accept.

attributes.name: charCounter
attributes.description: boolean Note: requires maxLength to be set. Display character counter with max length.

attributes.name: validity
attributes.description: The ValidityState of the textfield. (Read only)

attributes.name: autoValidate
attributes.description: boolean Reports validity on value change rather than only on blur.

attributes.name: validationMessage
attributes.description: Message to show in the error color when the textarea is invalid. (Helper text will not be visible)

attributes.name: willValidate
attributes.description: HTMLInputElement.prototype.willValidate (Read only)

attributes.name: validityTransform
attributes.description: Callback called before each validation check.

attributes.name: validateOnInitialRender
attributes.description: boolean Runs validation check on initial render.

tags.name: cv-toolbar
tags.description: Styling and formatting of text within an interface.

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: boolean Makes the bar a little smaller for higher density applications.

attributes.name: centerTitle
attributes.description: boolean Centers the title horizontally. Only meant to be used with 0 or 1 actionItems.

attributes.name: prominent
attributes.description: Makes the bar much taller, can be combined with dense.

attributes.name: scrollTarget
attributes.description: Element used to listen for scroll events. (Type: HTMLElement | Window)

attributes.name: sticky
attributes.description: boolean Position is sticky when scrolled.

tags.name: cv-tooltip
tags.description: Small pop-up box providing additional information when hovering over an element.

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.description: boolean Makes the tooltip persistent.

attributes.name: rich
attributes.description: boolean Displays the rich tooltip.

attributes.name: richTitle
attributes.description: The title of the rich tooltip.

attributes.name: hidedelay
attributes.description: Delay to hide tooltip in MS

attributes.name: showDelay
attributes.description: Delay to show the tooltip in MS

tags.name: cv-top-app-bar
tags.description: Horizontal bar at the top of an application containing navigation and other controls.

attributes.name: centerTitle
attributes.description: boolean Centers the title horizontally. Only meant to be used with 0 or 1 actionItems.

attributes.name: prominent
attributes.description: boolean Makes the bar much taller, can be combined with dense.

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: boolean Makes the bar a little smaller for higher density applications.

attributes.name: scrollTarget
attributes.description: Element used to listen for scroll events. (Type: HTMLElement | Window)

tags.name: cv-top-app-bar-fixed
tags.description: Fixed-positioned top app bar that remains visible when scrolling.

attributes.name: centerTitle
attributes.description: boolean Centers the title horizontally. Only meant to be used with 0 or 1 actionItems.

attributes.name: prominent
attributes.description: boolean Makes the bar much taller, can be combined with dense.

attributes.name: dense
attributes.description: boolean Makes the bar a little smaller for higher density applications.

attributes.name: scrollTarget
attributes.description: Element used to listen for scroll events.

tags.name: cv-tree-list
tags.description: Hierarchical list structure displaying data in a tree-like format.

tags.name: cv-tree-list-item
tags.description: Item within a tree list.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Optional icon for each list item.

attributes.name: isOpen
attributes.description: boolean Whether a list item is open.

attributes.name: indentLevel
attributes.description: Indicates which nest level a list item is at.

attributes.name: indentMultiple
attributes.description: How much left padding (px) to add for nested elements.
